About Me Projects

My Story

I am a Senior DevOps Engineer with over 5+ years of industry experience in automating, scaling, and securing cloud-native infrastructure. I hold certifications including the Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA) and AWS Certified Solutions Architect , and specialize in tools like Terraform, Helm, Docker, and Prometheus. My work spans across infrastructure automation, CI/CD pipeline development, Kubernetes administration, and cloud operations on AWS and GCP. I am passionate about building reliable, observable, and secure DevOps systems, and I’m actively exploring opportunities to drive innovation in cloud engineering, platform reliability, and DevSecOps.
